

I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = 0;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = '2';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select code
                      from currencies
                      where code = 'USD' LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select customers_firstname, customers_lastname
                         from customers
                         where customers_id = '1';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as count
                              from whos_online
                              where session_id = '8eupfald5ep4l7p0g949stdej2' and ip_address='127.0.0.1';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select banners_id, date_scheduled
                      from banners
                      where date_scheduled != 'NULL';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions,
                             sum(bh.banners_shown) as banners_shown
                      from banners b, banners_history bh
                      where b.status = 1
                      and b.banners_id = bh.banners_id
                      group by b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select *
        from get_terms_to_filter;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT project_version_major, project_version_minor FROM project_version WHERE project_version_key = 'Zen-Cart Database';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select startdate, counter, session_counter from counter_history where startdate='20121206';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT * FROM counter_history WHERE startdate = '20121206' AND counter = 1 AND session_counter = 1 LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select startdate, counter from counter;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from get_terms_to_filter;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select distinct m.manufacturers_id as id, m.manufacturers_name as name
      from products p, products_to_categories p2c, manufacturers m
      where p.products_status = 1
        and p.manufacturers_id = m.manufacturers_id
        and p.products_id = p2c.products_id
        and p2c.categories_id = '0'
      order by m.manufacturers_name;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select  p.products_id, p.products_type, p.master_categories_id, p.manufacturers_id, p.products_price, p.products_tax_class_id, pd.products_description, IF(s.status = 1, s.specials_new_products_price, NULL) as specials_new_products_price, IF(s.status =1, s.specials_new_products_price, p.products_price) as final_price, p.products_sort_order, p.product_is_call, p.product_is_always_free_shipping, p.products_qty_box_status
       from products_description pd, products p left join manufacturers m on p.manufacturers_id = m.manufacturers_id, products_to_categories p2c left join specials s on p2c.products_id = s.products_id
       where p.products_status = 1
         and p.products_id = p2c.products_id
         and pd.products_id = p2c.products_id
         and pd.language_id = '2'
         and p2c.categories_id = '0';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select cd.categories_name from categories c, categories_description cd where c.parent_id = 0 and c.categories_id = cd.categories_id and cd.language_id='2' and c.categories_status=1;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from ezpages where status_header = 1 and header_sort_order > 0 order by header_sort_order, pages_title;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select languages_id, name, code, image, directory
                          from languages 
                          order by sort_order;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select languages_id, name, code, image, directory
                          from languages 
                          order by sort_order;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select layout_box_name from layout_boxes where layout_box_location = 0 and layout_box_status= '1' and layout_template ='denim' order by layout_box_sort_order;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: bestsellers

Explain 
select distinct p.products_id, pd.products_name, p.products_ordered
                             from products p, products_description pd
                             where p.products_status = '1'
                             and p.products_ordered > 0
                             and p.products_id = pd.products_id
                             and pd.language_id = '2'
                             order by p.products_ordered desc, pd.products_name LIMIT 10;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: bestsellers

Explain 
select products_type from products where products_id = '1';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: bestsellers

Explain 
select type_handler from product_types where type_id = '1';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: bestsellers

Explain 
select products_type from products where products_id = '3';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: bestsellers

Explain 
select type_handler from product_types where type_id = '1';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: bestsellers

Explain 
select products_type from products where products_id = '2';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: bestsellers

Explain 
select type_handler from product_types where type_id = '1';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: bannerbox

Explain 
select banners_id, banners_title, banners_image, banners_html_text, banners_open_new_windows, banners_url
                           from banners
                               where status = 1  and ( banners_group = 'SideBox-Banners') order by rand();



I AM HERE index
sidebox: bannerbox

Explain 
select count(*) as count from banners_history                where banners_id = '3' and date_format(banners_history_date, '%Y%m%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d');



I AM HERE index
sidebox: bannerboxall

Explain 
select banners_id from banners where status = 1  and ( banners_group = 'BannersAll') order by banners_sort_order;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: bannerboxall

Explain 
select banners_id, banners_title, banners_image, banners_html_text, banners_open_new_windows, banners_url
                           from banners
                               where status = 1  and ( banners_group = 'BannersAll') order by rand();



I AM HERE index
sidebox: bannerboxall

Explain 
select banners_id, banners_title, banners_image, banners_html_text, banners_open_new_windows, banners_url
                         from banners
                         where status = 1
                         and banners_id = '5';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: bannerboxall

Explain 
select count(*) as count from banners_history                where banners_id = '5' and date_format(banners_history_date, '%Y%m%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d');



I AM HERE index
sidebox: bannerboxall

Explain 
select banners_id, banners_title, banners_image, banners_html_text, banners_open_new_windows, banners_url
                           from banners
                               where status = 1  and ( banners_group = 'BannersAll') order by rand();



I AM HERE index
sidebox: bannerboxall

Explain 
select banners_id, banners_title, banners_image, banners_html_text, banners_open_new_windows, banners_url
                         from banners
                         where status = 1
                         and banners_id = '9';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: bannerboxall

Explain 
select count(*) as count from banners_history                where banners_id = '9' and date_format(banners_history_date, '%Y%m%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d');

I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT categories_description
        FROM categories_description
        WHERE categories_id= 0
        AND language_id = 2;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_key, configuration_value from configuration where configuration_key RLIKE 'SHOW_PRODUCT_INFO_MAIN' and configuration_value > 0 order by configuration_value;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_tax_class_id, products_price, products_priced_by_attribute, product_is_free, product_is_call, products_type from products where products_id = '1' limit 1;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_price, products_priced_by_attribute from products where products_id = '1';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select options_id, price_prefix, options_values_price, attributes_display_only, attributes_price_base_included, round(concat(price_prefix, options_values_price), 5) as value from products_attributes where products_id = '1' and attributes_display_only != '1' and attributes_price_base_included='1' order by options_id, value;



I AM HERE index
sidebox:

select specials_new_products_price from specials where products_id = '1' and status='1';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select master_categories_id from products where products_id = '1';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_specials_condition, sale_deduction_value, sale_deduction_type from salemaker_sales where sale_categories_all like '%,1,%' and sale_status = '1' and (sale_date_start <= now() or sale_date_start = '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end >= now() or sale_date_end = '0001-01-01') and (sale_pricerange_from <= '122.0000' or sale_pricerange_from = '0') and (sale_pricerange_to >= '122.0000' or sale_pricerange_to = '0');



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sum(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null
                  or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '1'
                  group by tr.tax_priority;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select parent_id
                                from categories
                                where categories_id = '1';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_type from products where products_id = '1';

select products_type from products where products_id = '1';

select type_handler from product_types where type_id = '1';

sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_specials_condition, sale_deduction_value, sale_deduction_type from salemaker_sales where sale_categories_all like '%,3,%' and sale_status = '1' and (sale_date_start <= now() or sale_date_start = '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end >= now() or sale_date_end = '0001-01-01') and (sale_pricerange_from <= '12.0000' or sale_pricerange_from = '0') and (sale_pricerange_to >= '12.0000' or sale_pricerange_to = '0');



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sum(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null
                  or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '1'
                  group by tr.tax_priority;



I AM HERE index
sidebox:

select parent_id
                                from categories
                                where categories_id = '3';

I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_specials_condition, sale_deduction_value, sale_deduction_type from salemaker_sales where sale_categories_all like '%,2,%' and sale_status = '1' and (sale_date_start <= now() or sale_date_start = '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end >= now() or sale_date_end = '0001-01-01') and (sale_pricerange_from <= '12.0000' or sale_pricerange_from = '0') and (sale_pricerange_to >= '12.0000' or sale_pricerange_to = '0');



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sum(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null
                  or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '1'
                  group by tr.tax_priority;



I AM HERE index
sidebox:

                                from categories
                                where categories_id = '2';

Explain 
select products_type from products where products_id = '3';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select type_handler from product_types where type_id = '1';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select p.products_id, pd.products_name, products_date_available as date_expected, p.master_categories_id
                     from products p, products_description pd
                     where p.products_id = pd.products_id
                     and p.products_status = 1
                     and pd.language_id = '2' and p.products_date_available >20121206235959  order by date_expected desc
                   limit 10;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select layout_box_name from layout_boxes where layout_box_location=1 and layout_box_status=1 and layout_template ='denim' order by layout_box_sort_order;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: orderhistory

Explain 
select distinct op.products_id
                   from orders o, orders_products op, products p
                   where o.customers_id = '1'
                   and o.orders_id = op.orders_id
                   and op.products_id = p.products_id
                   and p.products_status = '1'
                   group by products_id
                   order by o.date_purchased desc
                   limit 6;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: orderhistory

Explain 
select products_id, products_name
                         from products_description
                         where products_id in (3,2,1)
                         and language_id = '2'
                         order by products_name;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: orderhistory

Explain 
select products_type from products where products_id = '3';

I AM HERE index
sidebox: shoppingcart

Explain 
select amount from coupon_gv_customer where customer_id = '1';



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from ezpages where status_footer = 1 and footer_sort_order > 0 order by footer_sort_order, pages_title;



I AM HERE index
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
            from sessions
            where sesskey = '8eupfald5ep4l7p0g949stdej2';
